title: Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: 'ConnectionWindow'.
author: vndnua
body_snippet:
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.MarshaledInvoke(Control caller, Delegate method, Object[] args, Boolean synchronous)

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.78.*
comments.author: robertpopa22

comments.snippet:

comments.snippet: This appears to match the same ConnectionWindow.Prot_Event_Closed disposed-object close-path as #3069. Candidate upstream fix package is PR #3106: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3106. After merge in parent, please retest on a build that includes that commit; if still reproducible with exact steps/logs, keep this issue open, otherwise close as duplicate of #3069.

notes: Manual triage: Duplicate of #1656/#3069 - disposed ConnectionWindow crash. Same stack trace. Already fixed in v1.79.0 PR #3106.
